ModuleEnabled.Name: Enable Module
ModuleEnabled.Hint: Enable or disable the Your Flavor module globally.

AllowPlayerCustomization.Name: Allow Player Customization
AllowPlayerCustomization.Hint: Allow players to customize their own chat messages. When disabled, only the GM can customize chat.

ForcePlayerLayout.Name: Force Player Layout
ForcePlayerLayout.Hint: Force all players to use a specific chat layout. This overrides individual player settings.

AllowCustomHtml.Name: Allow Custom HTML (Players)
AllowCustomHtml.Hint: Allow players to use custom HTML templates. GMs always have this ability. Use with caution.

ApplyToWhispers.Name: Apply to Whispers
ApplyToWhispers.Hint: Apply flavor styling to whisper messages as well.

UIScale.Name: Config Window Scale
UIScale.Hint: Scale the configuration window for better readability (80%-150%). Changes apply when opening the config window.

Configure.Name: Configure Your Flavor
Configure.Label: Open Configuration
Configure.Hint: Open the Your Flavor configuration panel to customize your chat style.

Config.Title: Your Flavor
Config.Subtitle: Customize how your chat messages appear
Config.PreviewText: This is how your messages will appear in chat!
Config.AdvancedWarning: Custom HTML can break chat rendering. Use with caution.
Config.TestMessage: This is a test message from Your Flavor! Looking awesome!
